entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
